sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-form @submit.prevent="login">
    <b-row>
      <b-col cols="12" md="6">
        <b-form-group>
          <b-input-group size="sm">
            <b-form-input
              ref="usernameInput"
              type="text"
              size="sm"
              v-model="user.User"
              :state="userstate.User"
              aria-describedby="input-user"
              placeholder="Usuário"
              autocomplete="username"
            >
            </b-form-input>
            <b-form-invalid-feedback id="input-user">
              Necessário informar o usuário
            </b-form-invalid-feedback>
          </b-input-group>
        </b-form-group>

        <b-form-group>
          <b-input-group size="sm">
            <b-form-input
              ref="passwordInput"
              type="password"
              size="sm"
              v-model="user.Password"
              :state="userstate.Password"
              aria-describedby="input-password"
              placeholder="Senha"
              autocomplete="current-password"
            >
            </b-form-input>
            <b-form-invalid-feedback id="input-password">
              Necessário informar a senha
            </b-form-invalid-feedback>
          </b-input-group>
        </b-form-group>
      </b-col>
      <b-col cols="12" md="6">
        <b-form-group>
          <b-input-group size="sm">
            <b-form-input
              ref="passwordInput"
              type="password"
              size="sm"
              v-model="user.NewPassword"
              :state="userstate.NewPassword"
              aria-describedby="input-password"
              placeholder="Nova Senha"
              autocomplete="current-password"
            >
            </b-form-input>
            <b-form-invalid-feedback id="input-password">
              Necessário informar a nova senha
            </b-form-invalid-feedback>
          </b-input-group>
        </b-form-group>

        <b-form-group>
          <b-input-group size="sm">
            <b-form-input
              ref="passwordInput"
              type="password"
              size="sm"
              v-model="user.ConfirmPassword"
              :state="userstate.ConfirmPassword"
              aria-describedby="input-confirmpassword"
              placeholder="Confirma Senha"
              autocomplete="current-confirmpassword"
            >
            </b-form-input>
            <b-form-invalid-feedback id="input-confirmpassword">
              As senhas não conferem
            </b-form-invalid-feedback>
          </b-input-group>
        </b-form-group>
      </b-col>
    </b-row>

    <b-form-group>
      <b-button
        block
        size="sm"
        variant="success"
        :disabled="vvalid"
        @click="$emit('evt-altera')"
      >
        Alterar
      </b-button>
    </b-form-group>

    <b-form-group>
      <b-button block size="sm" variant="danger" @click="$emit('evt-cancela')">
        Cancelar
      </b-button>
    </b-form-group>
  </b-form>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from "vuex";

export default {
  name: "LoginSenha",

  data() {
    return {
      redirect: `/${this.$route.query.redir || ""}`,
      user: {
        User: "",
        Password: "",
        NewPassword: "",
        ConfirmPassword: "",
      },
    };
  },

  computed: {
    ...mapGetters(["sysdevmode"]),
    userstate() {
      return {
        User: null,
        Password: null,
        NewPassword: null,
        ConfirmPassword: null,
      };
    },
    logoK1() {
      return require("../../../assets/Login.svg");
    },
    vvalid() {
      return (
        this.user.User == "" ||
        this.user.Password == "" ||
        this.user.NewPassword == "" ||
        this.user.ConfirmPassword == ""
      );
    },
    vdevmode() {
      // return false;
      return this.sysdevmode;
    },
  },

  methods: {
    go(ok) {
      if (ok.auth) {
        if (this.redirect !== "") {
          this.$router.push({ path: this.redirect });
        } else {
          this.$router.push("/home");
        }
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.fundo {
  background: rgb(233, 148, 148);
  background: radial-gradient(
    circle,
    rgba(233, 148, 148, 1) 0%,
    rgba(139, 44, 44, 1) 100%
  );
}
.padding-40 {
  padding: 40px;
}
.border-10 {
  border-radius: 10px !important;
}
.border-left10 {
  border-bottom-left-radius: 10px !important;
  border-top-left-radius: 10px !important;
}
.fullscreen {
}
.flexbox-container {
  /*
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: -webkit-flex;
  -ms-flex-align: center;
  -webkit-align-items: center;
  -webkit-box-align: center;
  display: flex;
  height: 100vh;
  align-items: center;
  */
}
.readok {
  color: lime;
  width: 130px;
  height: 130px;
  position: relative;
  margin: 0 auto;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
.btn-cams {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 9;
  right: 0;
  margin-top: 2px;
  margin-right: 22px;
}
.btn-torch {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 9;
  right: 0;
  margin-top: 2px;
  margin-right: 64px;
}
.topborder {
  border-top-right-radius: 20px;
  border-top-left-radius: 20px;
}
.logo {
  border-top-right-radius: 20px;
  border-top-left-radius: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  background-color: rgb(210, 53, 69);
}

@media screen and (max-width: 600px) {
  .border-10 {
    border-radius: 0 !important;
  }
  .border-left10 {
    border-radius: 0 !important;
  }
  .padding-40 {
    padding: 10px;
  }
}
</style>
